title: Could the new wonder above be pointing towards the release of  Ao shin
body: It was rumoured that he would come out near the lunar reveal assuming he wasn't canceld

replies.body: A bard who is immortal able to see into the future has a round shield probably come down to runeterra because he has to stop the watchers returning or history repeating its self so he has given up his immortal form to save runeterra from being destroyed and can only regain his form once he has saved runeterra

Given what is talked about in the 'new wonder' story it's pretty unlikely that it's Ao Shin. The Frozen Watchers of the Freljord have been mentioned, along with the fall of Shurima, a Shattered Crown and a figure known as a bard, none of which really fits with what we know about Ao Shin. There have been theories but most people have agreed it's not for Ao Shin.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NyqvHe-S1KI

This video kinda says something about the new champion. Although nothing finalised...

Nah he would come out on April Fools and succeeding Lee Sin to be the new bar standard for broken shat for the next 3 to 4 years, and the new breed of overloaded champs that would come out following his creation.

If that's so, I'll really go on riot.
no, meddler said in an AMA that ao shin isn't going to come out any time soon. this was like a month or so ago.
